Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Allows the wielder to become a boss -- Destroy all those flyers with this -- Who is the Kami now?
-- 20 second cooldown -- Add a RBXGear lib that allows for unified GUIs local function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print(instance) wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
-- The coolness factor local Wing_BoolValue = waitForChild(Tool, "Wing") local Wing_Weld = waitForChild(Tool, "WingWeld") local Fire_Part = waitForChild(Sword, "FirePart") local Wing_Fire = waitForChild(Fire_Part, "WingFire")
-- Flat damage, it also has burst using the WingCutter local Damage = 19
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService('Debris') local RBX_Players = game:GetService('Players')
local TimeOfDay
local Effect_Part = Instance.new('Part') Effect_Part.FormFactor =3 Effect_Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) Effect_Part.Name = 'WingCutter'
-- TODO: Add the mesh and texture IDs local Effect_Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') Effect_Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Effect_Mesh.Parent = Effect_Part
local Effect_Fire = Instance.new('Fire') Effect_Fire.Heat = 25 Effect_Fire.Size = 5.0 Effect_Fire.Parent = Effect_Part
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= vHumanoid and vHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if Wing_Fire and Wing_Fire.Enabled == true then coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and not humanoid.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("DarkFire") then local cFire = Wing_Fire:Clone() cFire.Parent = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") RBX_Debris:AddItem(cFire, 4) local duration = 4 while duration > 0 do humanoid:TakeDamage(5) duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end end end)) end end end end
function onEquipped() if Wing_Weld then Wing_Weld.Parent = Tool end if Wing_Fire then Wing_Fire.Enabled = true end vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
Wing_BoolValue.Changed:connect(function() if Wing_BoolValue and Wing_BoolValue.Value == true and vTorso then local players = RBX_Players:GetPlayers() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i] ~= vPlayer and players[i].Character then local torso = players[i].Character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then local humanoid = players[i].Character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local distance = (vTorso.Position - torso.Position).magnitude local tChildren = torso:GetChildren() local tabooCount = 0 -- All flight scripts will have these 3 forces -- Need to unify this, but for now this will nuke all of them local taboo_List = {['FlightSpin'] = true, ['FlightPower'] = true, ['FlightHold'] = true} for j = 1, #tChildren do if taboo_List[tChildren[j].Name] then tabooCount = tabooCount + 1 end end if distance < 120 and tabooCount >= 3 then local ePart = Effect_Part:Clone() ePart.CFrame = vTorso.CFrame ePart.CanCollide = false
local bForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') bForce.Name = 'Float' bForce.force = Vector3.new(0, ePart:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) bForce.Parent = ePart
-- I know, this is super fast, but that's how I roll ePart.Velocity = (torso.Position - vTorso.Position).unit * 200.0 ePart.Parent = game.Workspace
RBX_Debris:AddItem(ePart, 5.0)
ePart.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and torso and hit.Parent == torso then if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(65) end end end)
-- Now, to add the actual effect, lets make this cool if torso.Parent:FindFirstChild('UnwingScript') == nil then local tScript = script.UnwingScript:Clone() tScript.Parent = torso.Parent tScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
wait(20.0) Wing_BoolValue.Value = false end end)

-- Unwing this flyer!
local function WaitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Character = script.Parent local Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'Torso') local Humanoid = WaitForChild(Character, 'Humanoid')
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService('Debris')
local Wing_List = {['RightWing'] = true, ['LeftWing'] = true} local cChildren = Character:GetChildren() for k = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[k]:IsA('BasePart') and Wing_List[cChildren[k].Name] then local wing = cChildren[i] wing:BreakJoints() RBX_Debris:AddItem(wing, 7.5) end
if cChildren[k]:IsA('Tool') then cChildren[k]:Destroy() end end
Torso.Anchored = true
local Thorn_Part = Instance.new('Part') Thorn_Part.CanCollide = false Thorn_Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2) Thorn_Part.CFrame = Torso.CFrame Thorn_Part.Anchored = true Thorn_Part.Parent = Character
Thorn_Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Thorn_Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54653968" Thorn_Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54654008" Thorn_Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 0.6) Thorn_Mesh.Parent = Thorn_Part Thorn_Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.1, 0.1, 0.9)
local tChildren = Torso:GetChildren() for i = 1, #tChildren do if tChildren[i] and string.sub(tChildren[i].Name, 1, 6) == 'Flight' then tChildren[i]:Destroy() end end
wait(3.75) Torso.Anchored = false Thorn_Part:Destroy()
wait(1.0)
script:Destroy()

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Slash_Animation local Stab_Animation local Wing_Animation
local Charge_Animation
local Slash_Sound
local MouseDown_Bool = false
local Camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local Wing_BoolValue local Animating_Bool = false
local WindCounter = 0
local PlayerGui local Wing_Gui local Wing_Frame local Bar_Frame
local Wave_Part = Instance.new("Part") Wave_Part.FormFactor = 3 Wave_Part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 0.2, 4)
local Top_Decal = Instance.new("Decal") Top_Decal.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83658504" Top_Decal.Parent = Wave_Part Top_Decal.Face = "Top"
local Bottom_Decal = Top_Decal:Clone() Bottom_Decal.Face = "Bottom" Bottom_Decal.Parent = Wave_Part
local function createBarGui() if PlayerGui then Wing_Gui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") Wing_Gui.Name = "WingGui" Wing_Gui.Parent = PlayerGui
Wing_Frame = Instance.new("Frame") Wing_Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 Wing_Frame.Name = "WingFrame" Wing_Frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxSquare Wing_Frame.Parent = Wing_Gui Wing_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 220, 0, 30) Wing_Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -110, 1, -130)
Bar_Frame = Instance.new("Frame") Bar_Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.0 Bar_Frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.9) Bar_Frame.Parent = Wing_Frame Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30) Bar_Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, -8, 0, -8) Bar_Frame.Name = "Bar" end end
local function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= vHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(13) local char = humanoid.Parent local cChildren = char:GetChildren() for i = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[i]:IsA("Tool") or cChildren[i]:IsA("Hat") then cChildren[i].Parent = game.Workspace if cChildren[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then
local h = cChildren[i].Handle:Clone() h.CFrame = cChildren[i].Handle.CFrame h.Velocity = (vTorso.Position - h.Position).unit * 40.0 h.Parent = game.Workspace h.CanCollide = true
cChildren[i]:Destroy()
RBX_Debris:AddItem(h, 5.5) end end end end end end
local function releaseTheShockWave(counter) local wp = Wave_Part:Clone() wp.Size = wp.Size * (counter/30) wp.CFrame = CFrame.new(vTorso.Position, vTorso.Position + vTorso.CFrame.lookVector) wp.Transparency = 1.0 wp.CanCollide = false --wp.Anchored = true
local float_BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") float_BodyForce.Name = "Float" float_BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.1 * wp:GetMass(), 0) float_BodyForce.Parent = wp
-- TODO: Add some extra effect to possibly counter this -- Actually, look at the server code for the awesome bossy wing cutting --wp.Parent = game.Workspace
wp.Velocity = wp.CFrame.lookVector * 40.0 wp.Touched:connect(blow)
WindCounter = 0
RBX_Debris:AddItem(wp, 2.5) end
local function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
PlayerGui = waitForChild(vPlayer, "PlayerGui") if not Wing_Gui or not Wing_Gui.Parent then createBarGui() end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Animating_Bool == false then MouseDown_Bool = true Charge_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ChargeAnim) Charge_Animation:Play() local currentSpeed = vHumanoid.WalkSpeed while MouseDown_Bool do vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = math.min(vHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 0.1, 22) WindCounter = math.min(90, WindCounter + 1) Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, WindCounter/90 * 220, 0, 30) wait(0.1) end if WindCounter > 30 then Spawn(function() releaseTheShockWave(WindCounter) end) end if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end local vDirection = (vTorso.Position - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit local mDirection = (vHumanoid.TargetPoint - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit
local angleBetweenVectors = math.abs(math.acos(vDirection:Dot(mDirection))) if angleBetweenVectors < 0.5 then Slash_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) Slash_Animation:Play() else Stab_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StabAnim) Stab_Animation:Play() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 1, -0, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0) wait(1.3) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) end vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = currentSpeed else end end)
mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown_Bool = false if Animating_Bool == false then Tool.Enabled = false Animating_Bool = true wait(1.5) Tool.Enabled = true Animating_Bool = false end Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30) end)
mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then
Wing_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.WingAnim) Wing_Animation:Play()
vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 wait(1.25)
vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0
Wing_BoolValue = waitForChild(Tool, 'Wing') Wing_BoolValue.Value = true end end) end
local function onUnequipped() -- Do stuff if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end if Slash_Animation then Slash_Animation:Stop() end if Stab_Animation then Stab_Animation:Stop() end if Wing_Animation then Wing_Animation:Stop() end if Wing_Gui and Wing_Gui.Parent then --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer Wing_Gui:Destroy() end Animating_Bool = false Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) MouseDown_Bool = false if vHumanoid then vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
